  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_107639</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107639</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Internal structure of the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interne Struktur der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure interne de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura interna da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura interna della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσωτερική δομή της γης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura interna de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates the internal structure of the Earth. The crust, mantle, outer and inner cores are clearly indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inner core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">outer core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung veranschaulicht die interne 
Struktur der Masse. Die des Umhangs, äußeren und inneren Kerne
der Kruste, werden offenbar angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure illustre la structure interne de la 
terre. Les noyaux de croûte, de manteau, externes et 
intérieurs sont clairement indiqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura ilustra a estrutura interna da terra. 
Os núcleos da crosta, do mantle, os exteriores e os internos 
são indicados claramente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura illustra la struttura interna della 
terra. I nuclei esterni ed interni della crosta, del manto, sono
indicati chiaramente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επεξηγεί την εσωτερική δομή της γης. Η
κρούστα, ο μανδύας, οι εξωτερικοί και εσωτερικοί πυρήνες είναι 
σαφώς υποδειγμένοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura ilustra la estructura interna de la 
tierra. Las memorias de la corteza, de la capa, externas e 
internas se indican claramente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">innerer Kern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umhang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">äußerer Kern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">croûte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">noyau intérieur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">manteau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">noyau externe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
